overview.title: About This Site
overview.description:
Noun Gender is a comprehensive learning platform for mastering noun genders in multiple languages.

We provide translations, pronunciation, examples, memory techniques, and quizzes for over 4,600 words across 8 languages with noun gender.

purpose.title: Why This Site?
purpose.description:
Memorizing noun genders is one of the biggest barriers in studying German, French, Spanish, and other gendered languages.

The author, based in Japan where Japanese has no noun gender. However, was interested in this distant linguistic concept and created this tool for personal study at first.

Existing learning tools had issues. They lacked information for languages like Hindi and Arabic. Most just provided lists without explaining why words have certain genders.

There was frustration that dramatic improvements were possible with better presentation. With my development knowledge and accelerated development speed through generative AI, this seemed achievable.

support.title: Please Support This Project!
support.description:
This site requires ongoing server costs, maintenance, and development time.

We also plan to expand to over 10,000 words - while word extraction is complete, the subsequent work of translations, examples, and memory techniques creation requires enormous costs.

Your support helps keep this resource free and accessible to language learners worldwide.
